channel.title: Elf City Documents
channel.description:
I'm sure not a lot of you actually follow RuneScape news, but Jagex has been releasing information on the Elf city coming out after the summer. It's basically going to be a place for people with high levels/near maxed.
The quest for it comes out in August. City batch 1 in September City batch 2 in start of November
[b]Batch 1:[/b] Tower of Voices (includes G.E. and lodestone) 4 of the 8 segments:
[ul][li]Slayer/Melee (Iorwerth)[/li] [li]Mining/Smithing[/li] [li]Woodcutting/Farming[/li] [li]Ranged/Magic (Cadarn)[/li][/ul]
[b]Batch 2:[/b] Other 4 segments:
[ul][li]Agility/Prayer[/li] [li]Divination/Summoning[/li] [li]Dungeoneering/Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting/Construction (Ithell)[/li][/ul]
The design is complete, the update is in early development stages.
[b]The quest:[/b]
[ul][li]Skill requirements: 10 skills, each level 75 (including Dungeoneering, Ranged, Construction, Woodcutting, but not Divination)[/li] [li]The quest is the only requirement to access the city itself[/li] [li]All other elf-related quests will be requirements for the quest (MEP 1/2, Within the Light, Roving Elves, Plague[/li] [li]City, Catapult Construction), these will receive some graphical tweaks[/li] [li]The quest will be long, the aim is about 2 hours[/li][/ul]
[b]First Documents:[/b] https://cdn.runescape.com/assets/docs/external/elfcity/TheTowerOfVoices.pdf
[b]Second Documents:[/b] https://cdn.runescape.com/assets/docs/external/elfcity/IorwerthAndCadarn.pdf
[b]Third Documents:[/b] https://cdn.runescape.com/assets/docs/external/elfcity/TrahaearnAndCrwys.pdf
[b]Fourth Documents:[/b] https://cdn.runescape.com/assets/docs/external/elfcity/IthellAndAmlodd.pdf
[b]Fifth Documents:[/b] http://cdn.runescape.com/assets/docs/external/elfcity/HefinAndMeilyr.pdf

item.title: Elf City Documents
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

alex4ever:

I also just got the crystal motherload shard from wearing my crystal amulet and doing skills for an hour. I enjoyed the enlightenment aorur but hate how long it takes for it to recharge.

It’s double xp for 2 hours, a week cool down time isn’t all that bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Elf City Documents
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:543263”]I wish they added this back before they messed up the game, I was a big quester and the elf city was something I was really looking forward too. Glad they are doing it eventually though.[/quote]I agree. I still play and I only have 8 quests left but back years ago while doing quests, I was always hoping to get to go in to the elf city. I am honestly surprised how long it took them to release it.

I also just got the crystal motherload shard from wearing my crystal amulet and doing skills for an hour. I enjoyed the enlightenment aorur but hate how long it takes for it to recharge.

Read full topic

Or JaGeX is doing it to raise hype

item.title: Elf City Documents
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Third documents were somehow leaked.

They were probably on the site and someone got the url with a filescanner or similar. I don’t know obviously.

I’ve been watching RS here and there, and I was upset in the poll they had for elf city, everyone voted for it to be another agility course. Good to see they’re actually putting more stuff into it.
Maybe (aside from the new quest) I’ll be able to access it

item.title: Elf City Documents
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m sure not a lot of you actually follow RuneScape news, but Jagex has been releasing information on the Elf city coming out after the summer. It’s basically going to be a place for people with high levels/near maxed.

The quest for it comes out in August.
City batch 1 in September
City batch 2 in start of November

Batch 1:
Tower of Voices (includes G.E. and lodestone)
4 of the 8 segments:

[ul][li]Slayer/Melee (Iorwerth)[/li]
[li]Mining/Smithing[/li]
[li]Woodcutting/Farming[/li]
[li]Ranged/Magic (Cadarn)[/li][/ul]

Batch 2:
Other 4 segments:

[ul][li]Agility/Prayer[/li]
[li]Divination/Summoning[/li]
[li]Dungeoneering/Herblore[/li]
[li]Crafting/Construction (Ithell)[/li][/ul]

The design is complete, the update is in early development stages.

The quest:

[ul][li]Skill requirements: 10 skills, each level 75 (including Dungeoneering, Ranged, Construction, Woodcutting, but not Divination)[/li]
[li]The quest is the only requirement to access the city itself[/li]
[li]All other elf-related quests will be requirements for the quest (MEP 1/2, Within the Light, Roving Elves, Plague[/li] [li]City, Catapult Construction), these will receive some graphical tweaks[/li]
[li]The quest will be long, the aim is about 2 hours[/li][/ul]
